Get in touch

Contact

Reach out to collaborate, request resources, or share feedback with the Salafi Science Network team.

We welcome correspondence from communities, masajid, and students of knowledge. Whether you require tailored lesson plans, wish to collaborate on translations, or have a question about our resources, the team will respond as soon as possible.

Email

contact@salafisciencenetwork.org

Contribution requests

If you are a student of knowledge or translator keen to contribute, please include:

  • Your background in Islamic studies and teachers with whom you have studied.
  • The type of content you would like to submit (article, lesson, audio, etc.).
  • Preferred language pair if submitting translations.

Community support

Communities seeking structured programs or weekend school material may outline their needs so we can provide the most relevant resources. We aim to support masajid and institutes with authentic, classroom-ready material rooted in the methodology of the Salaf.
